name: Sacrifitem
description:
Sacrifitem is a local multiplayer fighting game where the players are required to sacrifice items in order to play other items.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 43 Jam with the theme "Sacrifices must be made" and was inspired by some card and fighting games. You can check it all here as well as some additional info about gameplay

Controls:

  • LMB -> use item
  • RMB -> sacrifice item
